title: Why does nobody play Anivia?
body: I don't understand how seemingly nobody understands her outplay and damage potential.

Is the last time you've seen Anivia before how slows got reworked?

I think people forget that her kit has a lot of tools that counter many meta picks such as hard cc and an egg, many assassins and burst mages have nothing to kill her egg after they proc it because they lack any sustain damage, melee champs often have gap closers but not escapes (in most cases) therefore they can usually be stunned easily and be stuck in her ultimate. Not to mention her wall and aoe stun/slow can help her escape ganks.
